name: Slime Café
description:
Begin your new life as an employee at the illustrious Slime Café! Interact with at least 2 unique slime characters! Make friends and smile! Made in <48 hours for SLIME JAM.

All art and music is by me! It's not super well done but I hope you enjoy it even a little bit. I'll maybe update this at some point with more content, but I'm happy with it in its current state.

Please enjoy!
